hanzi-su-wiki:
駿

Значения

Быстроходный, превосходный

Мнемоника

Искажено. Справа — злой, т.е. бурлак 夂 ограбленный злодеем 兇. Злой, норовистый конь 馬, прекрасный скакун.

Варианты

骏
purpleculture_pinyin:
jùn
spirited horse
резвый конь
rtega_mnemonic:
駿駿RS
骏骏		excellent horse, noble steed, fast person
  • horse 馬 able to walk slowly 夋 and stately in a parade; can also run very fast
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 骏)
Pictophonetic: 夋 indicates the sound; 馬 (horse) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
駿馬 [ jùn mǎ ]: fine horse; steed
駿豪集團 [ jùn háo jí tuán ]: Mission Hills Group (golf company)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 馬 [ mǎ ] horse; surname
    • 夋 [ qūn ] to dawdle; the emperor Yao's father
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: When a horse sees a spider it will start running at a speed no one ever thought a horse could go! Horses are super afraid of spiders, you see, so if they see one, they'll bolt and reach top speed! That's actually the only way to get a horse to run that fast.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine the eyes of a horse seeing a spider and then running at top speed to get the heck away from it.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Once people realize that they can increase the speed of their horses, soon (しゅん) everyone will be taking spiders with them to scare their horses into running faster. I say soon because it hasn't quite caught on yet. But if you help to spread the word it can happen even sooner.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Soon the world will be filled with horses running at full speed all thanks to the spider increase of the 2000s! Soon we will be in the future of top speeds!
Ru_Meaning: a good horse, speed, a fast person

Ru_Radicals: 儿 (ножки), 厶 (значок МУ), 夂 (зима), 馬 (лошадь)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the horse (馬) has a license to go (夋) fast
humanum_full_description_en:
From " horse " to "夋" sound. The original meaning is good horse. "Said the text": "A horse is a good man. From the horse, the sound." Such as "Lu Shi Chunqiu. "Quan Xun": "The bifurcation of the husband and the thorns is the treasure of my ancestor; the vehicle of yielding, the horse of the widowed." "The Biography of Mu Tianzi. Volume One: "The Horse of the Son of Heaven: Chi Ji, Pirate Li, Bai Yi, Yulun, Shanzi, Quhuang, Hualiu, Green Ear." Guo Pu's note: "The horse is a good name for a horse."

" Jun " by extension means good and good. Such as "Warring States Policy. "Yan Ce II": "Everyone has a horse seller, and the market is better than three dans. Everyone knows nothing." "Historical Records. "Xiang Yu Benji": "There is a beautiful person named Yu, often fortunate to follow; a steed is called a horse, and often rides on it."

" Jun " means swift. "Er Ya. "Explanation on": "Jun, speed is also." Guo Pu's note: "Jun is still fast, but also disease." Such as "Poetry. Zhou Song. "Hehe": "Prosperous and private, for thirty miles." Zheng Xuanjian: "Jun, ill; fa, cutting.... Make the people develop their private fields quickly." "Guan Zi. Discipleship": "If there are guests, the disciple Junzuo will not give way to the guest, so he should do it." Yin Zhizhang's note: "Junzuo, get up quickly."

" Jun " through " jun " means outstanding. Such as "Warring States Policy. "Qin Cesan": "The Yankee Cai Ze, the world's strongest scholar of debate." "Wen Xin Diao Long. Spiritual Thinking: "If you are a man with prosperous hair, your heart always needs skills, and you should be quick and decisive before thinking."

" Chun " pass " Jun " indicates tall. "Er Ya. "Explanation": "Jun, Da Ye." Hao Yixing Yi Shu: "Jun, Tong Zuo Jun." Such as "Poetry. Daya. "Song Gao": "Song Gao Weiyue, Junji is in the sky." Mao Chuan: "Jun, big; extremely, extremely."

" Jun " also means long. Such as "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Yu Wuzheng": "Haohao, Haotian, not good for virtue." Mao Chuan: "Good fortune, long."
humanum_short_description_en: From " horse " to "夋" sound. The original meaning is good horse, and the extension means good and good.
humanum_full_description:
從「馬」，「夋」聲。本義為良馬。《說文》：「駿，馬之良材者。从馬，夋聲。」如《呂氏春秋．權勛》：「夫垂棘之璧，吾先君之寶也；屈產之乘，寡人之駿也。」《穆天子傳．卷一》：「天子之駿：赤驥、盜驪、白義、踰輪、山子、渠黃、華騮、綠耳。」郭璞注：「駿者，馬之美稱。」

　　「駿」引申表示優良的、良好的。如《戰國策．燕策二》：「人有賣駿馬者，比三旦立市，人莫之知。」《史記．項羽本紀》：「有美人名虞，常幸從；駿馬名騅，常騎之。」

　　「駿」表示迅速。《爾雅．釋詁上》：「駿，速也。」郭璞注：「駿猶迅速，亦疾也。」如《詩．周頌．噫嘻》：「駿發爾私，終三十里。」鄭玄箋：「駿，疾也；發，伐也。……使民疾耕發其私田。」《管子．弟子職》：「若有賓客，弟子駿作，對客無讓，應且遂行。」尹知章注：「駿作，迅起也。」

　　「駿」通「俊」，表示傑出。如《戰國策．秦策三》：「燕客蔡澤，天下駿雄弘辯之士也。」《文心雕龍．神思》：「若夫駿發之士，心總要術，敏在慮前，應機立斷。」

　　「駿」通「峻」，表示高大。《爾雅．釋詁上》：「駿，大也。」郝懿行義疏：「駿，通作峻。」如《詩．大雅．崧高》：「崧高維嶽，駿極于天。」毛傳：「駿，大；極，至也。」

　　「駿」還表示長。如《詩．小雅．雨無正》：「浩浩昊天，不駿其德。」毛傳：「駿，長也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「馬」，「夋」聲。本義為良馬，引申表示優良的、良好的。

從「 馬 」，「 夋 」聲。本義為良馬。《說文》：「駿，馬之良材者。从馬，夋聲。」如《呂氏春秋．權勛》：「夫垂棘之璧，吾先君之寶也；屈產之乘，寡人之駿也。」《穆天子傳．卷一》：「天子之駿：赤驥、盜驪、白義、踰輪、山子、渠黃、華騮、綠耳。」郭璞注：「駿者，馬之美稱。」 「 駿 」引申表示優良的、良好的。如《戰國策．燕策二》：「人有賣駿馬者，比三旦立市，人莫之知。」《史記．項羽本紀》：「有美人名虞，常幸從；駿馬名騅，常騎之。」 「 駿 」表示迅速。《爾雅．釋詁上》：「駿，速也。」郭璞注：「駿猶迅速，亦疾也。」如《詩．周頌．噫嘻》：「駿發爾私，終三十里。」鄭玄箋：「駿，疾也；發，伐也。……使民疾耕發其私田。」《管子．弟子職》：「若有賓客，弟子駿作，對客無讓，應且遂行。」尹知章注：「駿作，迅起也。」 「 駿 」通「 俊 」，表示傑出。如《戰國策．秦策三》：「燕客蔡澤，天下駿雄弘辯之士也。」《文心雕龍．神思》：「若夫駿發之士，心總要術，敏在慮前，應機立斷。」 「 駿 」通「 峻 」，表示高大。《爾雅．釋詁上》：「駿，大也。」郝懿行義疏：「駿，通作峻。」如《詩．大雅．崧高》：「崧高維嶽，駿極于天。」毛傳：「駿，大；極，至也。」 「 駿 」還表示長。如《詩．小雅．雨無正》：「浩浩昊天，不駿其德。」毛傳：「駿，長也。」

駿字的基本解释

駿
jùn
见“骏”。

駿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jùn］
［《廣韻》子峻切，去稕，精。］
“骏1”的繁体字。
(1)良马。
(2)迅速。
(3)大，高大。
(4)长，长久。
(5)通“俊”。才智杰出。
(6)通“峻”。挺拔。
(7)通“峻”。严厉。参见“駿刑”。

駿字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【馬字部】　駿； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1439第26
【唐韻】子峻切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】祖峻切，?音俊。【玉篇】馬之美稱。【博物志】周穆公欲驅八駿周行天下。又與俊同。英儁也。【史記·屈原傳】誹駿疑桀。　又大也。【詩·商頌】爲下國駿厖。【傳】駿，大也。　又與峻通。【詩·大雅】崧高維嶽，駿極于天。　又【爾雅·釋詁】速也。【疏】駿者，猶迅也。【詩·周頌】駿發爾私。【鄭箋】駿，疾也。【朱傳】駿，大也。使之大發其私田也。　又駿狼，山名。【淮南子·天文訓】日冬至駿狼之山。一本作峻。又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?須閏切，音峻。義同。

jùn
вм. 骏
Radicals: 馬, 夋  (horse, spider)
Meaning Mnemonic
When a horse sees a spider it will start running at a speed no one ever thought a horse could go! Horses are super afraid of spiders, you see, so if they see one, they'll bolt and reach top speed! That's actually the only way to get a horse to run that fast.
Imagine the eyes of a horse seeing a spider and then running at top speed to get the heck away from it.
Reading Mnemonic
Once people realize that they can increase the speed of their horses, soon (しゅん) everyone will be taking spiders with them to scare their horses into running faster. I say soon because it hasn't quite caught on yet. But if you help to spread the word it can happen even sooner.
Soon the world will be filled with horses running at full speed all thanks to the spider increase of the 2000s! Soon we will be in the future of top speeds!
